definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of

sentences.english: Resistance temperature sensor makes temperature setting more accurate, safe and hygienic.
sentences.chinese: 电阻式测温棒使温度设定更精准，更安全卫生。

sentences.english: The effectiveness of the rider's aids determines the precise fulfilment of the required movements of the tests.
sentences.chinese: 骑手扶助的效率，决定执行测验中的动作的精准度。

sentences.english: The project objectives were defined with laser-like precision.
sentences.chinese: 项目的目标定义得非常精准。

sentences.english: Separate exposure box design, contrapuntal accurate.
sentences.chinese: 分离式曝光盒设计，对位精准。

sentences.english: Englund also praised Muller's "extreme precision with words".
sentences.chinese: 恩默德同时还赞扬了穆勒“运用词汇的精准”。

sentences.english: This time, the hype centers on more precise ways to sell.
sentences.chinese: 这一次，炒作集中于以更精准的方式销售商品。

sentences.english: Ability to estimate crop information from remotely sensed imagery is fundamental in precision agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 估计农作物遥感影像信息的能力是在精准农业的基础。

sentences.english: In a general sense, accuracy means correctness, truth, and exactitude.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，精准就是指正确，真实，以及精确。

sentences.english: Use the 5$ fat caliper from accumeasure.
sentences.chinese: 通过精准的测量，减去的是5$卡尺的脂肪。

sentences.english: Donald himself has yet to comment on the anatomical accuracy of the doll.
sentences.chinese: 川普自己已经承认了这个娃娃在解剖学上的精准性。

sentences.english: This is the sort of bull's-eye at which Salinger is unmatched.
sentences.chinese: 塞林格这种精准的描述是任何人也无法企及的。

sentences.english: He ran square from the left before flicking the ball through at a right angle.
sentences.chinese: 他从左路内切，然后轻弹皮球精准地挑射入网。

sentences.english: New ball physics accurately recreate bouncing, skidding and topspin.
sentences.chinese: 球的新的物理性能精准地再现球的反弹，滑动和上旋。

sentences.english: Suction outlet controlled by servo motor precision, following the knife edge automatic adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 吸风口由伺服电机精准控制，跟随边刀自动调整。

sentences.english: Orientation choice of implementing precision agriculture in China.

definition: to grasp (also fig.)/to seize/to hold/assurance/certainty/sure (of the outcome)
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
